sections.title: Idea
sections.content: Create an app for a pizzeria to streamline ordering, customization, and delivery.

sections.title: Market Research
sections.content: Investigate the pizzeria market, customer preferences, and competitors' apps. Assess the demand for a dedicated app that simplifies the ordering process and personalizes user experiences.

sections.title: Business Model
sections.content: Freemium model with optional paid features such as loyalty programs or premium toppings.

sections.title: Marketing Plan
sections.content: Utilize social media, targeted ads, influencer partnerships, and app store optimization to reach potential customers.

content.Frontend: React Native or Flutter for cross-platform compatibility.
content.Backend: Node.js with Express.js for server management.
content.Database: Firebase or MongoDB for user data and order storage.
content.Payment Processing: Stripe or PayPal for secure transactions.

sections.title: Launch Plan
sections.content: Soft launch in a limited geographical area to gather feedback, followed by a full launch with marketing campaigns and partnerships.
